column4: how comes I have to use 'remove usb device' in ubuntu, because data gets lost/corrupted? in winxp I can just pull out my usb stick
you can't "just" pull it out in windows either... you should use "safely remove"
Ubuntu also doesn't write to disk immediately, it caches it to help preserve life of your usb stic
so if you don't install it safely you may lose data
